categories.name: Astrology
categories.description: Consult with our expert astrologers for guidance and remedies.

items.name: Navgrah Yantraa
items.description: Sacred Navgrah Yantra crafted to balance the energies of all nine planets; energised and ready to use.
items.content: The Navgrah Yantra is a powerful tool in Vedic astrology designed to harmonize the influences of the nine planets (Navagraha) in your life. It attracts prosperity, peace, and protection while removing obstacles caused by planetary doshas.

benefits.text: Balances planetary energies in your horoscope.
Brings prosperity, success, and good luck.
Promotes peace, health, and harmony in life.

howToUse.instruction: Place the Yantra on a clean altar or pooja space facing east or north.
Light a diya or incense in front of it daily and chant the Navgrah mantra for 5–10 minutes.
Keep it energized by occasional cleansing with Ganga Jal and meditation.

items.name: Surya Yantra - Copper Plate
items.description: Energized Surya Yantra crafted on pure copper plate for vitality, leadership, and success.
items.content: The Surya Yantra is dedicated to Lord Surya (the Sun). It blesses the devotee with good health, leadership qualities, and strong willpower. Energized with mantras, it removes the ill effects of a weak Sun in the horoscope.

benefits.text: Strengthens Sun’s energy in horoscope for vitality and success.
Improves leadership, authority, and recognition in society.
Removes negative effects of weak or afflicted Sun.
Promotes good health, strong immunity, and confidence.

howToUse.instruction: Install the Yantra on a Sunday morning facing East after sunrise.
Offer red flowers, jaggery, and water to the Yantra daily.
Chant ‘Om Hram Hreem Hraum Sah Suryaya Namah’ 11 or 21 times.

items.name: Chandra Yantra - Copper Plate
items.description: Sacred Chandra Yantra engraved on copper to bring peace, emotional stability, and calmness of mind.
items.content: The Chandra Yantra is dedicated to the Moon (Chandra Dev). It promotes inner peace, mental clarity, and emotional balance. It is especially helpful for reducing stress, anxiety, and mood swings caused by a weak Moon in one’s chart.

benefits.text: Brings peace of mind and emotional stability.
Strengthens intuition, memory, and mental clarity.
Reduces anxiety, stress, and depression caused by weak Moon.
Improves relationships and harmony at home.

howToUse.instruction: Place the Yantra on a Monday evening in the North-West direction.
Offer white flowers, rice, and milk to the Yantra.
Chant ‘Om Shram Shreem Shraum Sah Chandraya Namah’ 11 times daily.

items.name: Mangal Yantra - Copper Plate
items.description: Powerful Mangal Yantra crafted on copper for courage, protection, and overcoming obstacles.
items.content: The Mangal Yantra is devoted to the planet Mars. It provides strength, courage, and determination. It helps reduce the malefic effects of Mangal Dosha and protects from accidents, debts, and conflicts.

benefits.text: Protects from accidents, debts, and conflicts.
Reduces malefic effects of Mangal Dosha.
Increases vitality and energy in daily life.

howToUse.instruction: Install the Yantra on a Tuesday morning facing South.
Offer red flowers, sindoor, and jaggery to the Yantra.
Chant ‘Om Kraam Kreem Kraum Sah Bhaumaya Namah’ 11 times.

items.name: Budh Yantra - Copper Plate
items.description: Wisdom, intelligence, and communication skills.
items.content: Dedicated to Mercury (Budh), enhances intellect, learning ability, and communication.

benefits.text: Enhances intelligence, learning ability, and memory.
Protects from speech disorders and misunderstandings.

howToUse.instruction: Install on a Wednesday morning facing North.
Offer green fruits, tulsi leaves, and incense.
Chant ‘Om Bram Breem Braum Sah Budhaya Namah’ 11 or 21 times.

items.name: Guru Yantra - Copper Plate
items.description: Spiritual wisdom, prosperity, and education.
items.content: Associated with Jupiter (Guru), brings blessings of wealth, knowledge, and spiritual growth.

benefits.text: Brings wisdom, prosperity, and spiritual knowledge.
Removes obstacles in education and career growth.
Improves relationships with teachers and mentors.
Strengthens Jupiter’s positive influence in horoscope.

howToUse.instruction: Place the Yantra on a Thursday morning facing North-East.
Offer yellow flowers, turmeric, and sweets to the Yantra.
Chant ‘Om Gram Greem Graum Sah Gurave Namah’ 11 times daily.

items.name: Shukra Yantra - Copper Plate
items.description: Love, harmony, and financial prosperity.
items.content: Dedicated to Venus (Shukra), attracts wealth, relationships, and luxuries.

benefits.text: Attracts love, harmony, and marital bliss.
Brings luxuries, financial prosperity, and comforts.
Reduces ill-effects of weak Venus in horoscope.

howToUse.instruction: Install the Yantra on a Friday morning facing East.
Offer white flowers, curd, and sweets to the Yantra.
Chant ‘Om Dram Dreem Draum Sah Shukraya Namah’ 11 times daily.

items.name: Shani Yantra - Copper Plate
items.description: Discipline, justice, and protection from Shani Dosha.
items.content: Associated with Saturn (Shani Dev), reduces hardships, debts, and delays.

benefits.text: Protects from Shani Dosha, delays, and hardships.
Brings discipline, justice, and focus in life.
Reduces effects of debts, losses, and misfortunes.

howToUse.instruction: Install on a Saturday evening facing West.
Offer black sesame seeds, mustard oil, and blue flowers.
Chant ‘Om Pram Preem Praum Sah Shanaye Namah’ 11 times.

items.name: Rahu Yantra - Copper Plate
items.description: Victory, clarity, and protection from illusions.
items.content: Dedicated to Rahu, helps overcome confusion, sudden obstacles, and negativity.

benefits.text: Removes confusion, illusions, and sudden obstacles.
Brings clarity of thought and determination.
Reduces harmful effects of Rahu Dosha.
Helps in achieving victory over enemies.

howToUse.instruction: Install on a Saturday evening in the South-West corner.
Offer blue flowers, coconut, and incense sticks.
Chant ‘Om Bhram Bhreem Bhraum Sah Rahave Namah’ 11 times.

items.name: Ketu Yantra - Copper Plate
items.description: Spiritual awakening and liberation.
items.content: Associated with Ketu, enhances detachment, spirituality, and psychic abilities.

benefits.text: Improves meditation, intuition, and psychic abilities.
Reduces negativity and fears related to Ketu.
Brings moksha and liberation from past karmas.

howToUse.instruction: Install on a Tuesday evening facing South-West.
Offer multi-colored flowers, incense, and milk.
Chant ‘Om Sram Sreem Sraum Sah Ketave Namah’ 11 times daily.

items.name: Shri Sarv Karya Siddhi Yantra - Copper Plate
items.description: Success in all endeavors.
items.content: This Yantra ensures overall growth, prosperity, and achievement of goals.

howToUse.instruction: Place in a clean and sacred space at home or office.
Offer flowers, incense, and chant relevant mantras regularly.

packageContents: One Energized Copper Shri Sarv Karya Siddhi Yantra

items.name: Shree Sampoorn Kuber Laxhmi Yantra - Copper Plate
items.description: Wealth, abundance, and prosperity.
items.content: Dedicated to Goddess Lakshmi and Lord Kuber, attracts wealth and financial stability.

benefits.text: Brings stability in finances and career growth.
Protects wealth from losses and mismanagement.
Blesses the household with luxuries and comforts.

howToUse.instruction: Install on a Friday morning facing East in cash locker or office.
Offer yellow flowers, rice, and sweets.
Chant ‘Om Shreem Hreem Kleem Namah’ 21 times.

packageContents: One Energized Copper Shree Sampoorn Kuber Laxhmi Yantra

items.name: Siddh Saraswati Yantra - Copper Plate
items.description: Knowledge, wisdom, and education.
items.content: Dedicated to Goddess Saraswati, improves intellect, creativity, and academic excellence.

benefits.text: Blesses with wisdom and divine learning.

howToUse.instruction: Install on a Thursday morning facing North.
Offer white flowers, fruits, and incense sticks.

packageContents: One Energized Copper Siddh Saraswati Yantra

items.name: Shri Kanakdhara Yantra - Copper Plate
items.description: Wealth, prosperity, and good fortune.
items.content: Associated with Goddess Lakshmi, brings wealth, blessings, and removes poverty.

items.name: Ganesh Yantra - Copper Plate
items.description: Removes obstacles and ensures success.
items.content: Dedicated to Lord Ganesha, clears hurdles and brings wisdom and prosperity.

benefits.text: Removes obstacles and ensures success in ventures.

howToUse.instruction: Install on a Wednesday morning in East direction.
Offer durva grass, red flowers, and modaks to the Yantra.

items.name: Gayatri Yantra - Copper Plate
items.description: Spiritual growth and divine blessings.
items.content: Dedicated to Goddess Gayatri, enhances concentration, wisdom, and spiritual upliftment.

benefits.text: Enhances wisdom, concentration, and spiritual power.
Protects from evil influences and negativity.
Blesses with divine knowledge and clarity.

howToUse.instruction: Install on a Sunday morning facing East.
Offer red/yellow flowers and pure water.

items.name: Maha Mrityunjaya Yantra - Copper Plate
items.description: Health, healing, and longevity.
items.content: Dedicated to Lord Shiva, protects against diseases, fears, and premature death.

benefits.text: Protects from untimely death and accidents.
Brings blessings of Lord Shiva for overall protection.

howToUse.instruction: Install on a Monday morning facing East near puja altar.
Offer bel leaves, milk, and white flowers.
Chant ‘Om Tryambakam Yajamahe Sugandhim Pushtivardhanam’ 108 times.

packageContents: One Energized Copper Maha Mrityunjaya Yantra

items.name: Vastu Yantra - Copper Plate
items.description: Balances energies of living spaces.
items.content: Removes Vastu dosha and ensures harmony, peace, and prosperity at home and office.

benefits.text: Balances energies of living and working spaces.

howToUse.instruction: Install in the central part of the house or workplace.
Offer flowers, incense, and pure water regularly.
